DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether 1 year worksite base life-style intervention reduce body weight increase physical capacity subsequently reduce musculoskeletal disorder increase workability overweight health care worker .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise , Dietary Counseling Cognitive Behavioral Training Combined Intervention Reduce Weight Increase Workability Health Care Workers
DOC.detailed_description: Health care worker high rate musculoskeletal disorder sick leave poor workability physical fitness . Most study focus increase physical fitness order increase workability reduce musculoskeletal disorder sick leave . Studies however also show many health care worker obese obesity link poor workability . Limited research available effect reduce body-weight group order increase workability decrease musculoskeletal disorder sick leave . This study introduces combine worksite base lifestyle intervention consist physical exercise , dietary counseling cognitive behavioral training aim reduce weight health care worker . On specific worksites , health care worker cluster randomize either intervention control group . Effects physical capacity , body composition , musculoskeletal disorder , workability sick leave evaluate 1 year intervention period
